TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class DataGridColumnCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridColumnCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class DataGridColumnCollection Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class DataGridColumnCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type DataGridColumnCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 衍生資料行物件的集合，表示在 控制項中的資料行。

span.span: A collection of -derived column objects that represent the columns in a control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以程式設計方式管理集合的集合-衍生資料行物件。Use the collection to programmatically manage a collection of -derived column objects. 這些物件表示中的資料行控制項。These objects represent the columns in a control. 您可以新增、 移除或插入資料行中的集合。You can add, remove, or insert columns in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為`true,`所建立的資料行控制項不會新增至集合。When the property is set to `true,` the columns created by the control are not added to the collection. 控制項不會儲存的內容及其檢視狀態中的集合。The control does not store the contents of its collection in the view state. 若要新增或移除資料行，以動態方式，您必須以程式設計方式新增或移除資料行，每次重新整理頁面時。To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column every time the page is refreshed. 提供`Page_Init`函式，加入或移除資料行之前並重新載入控制項的狀態和控制項就會重建。Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the control's state is reloaded and the control is rebuilt. 否則，所做的變更集合不會反映在控制項顯示時。Otherwise, the changes to the collection are not reflected in the control when it is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以以程式設計方式將資料行加入或移除資料行從的集合控制項，它是您更輕鬆地以靜態方式列出的資料行，然後使用來顯示或隱藏每個資料行的屬性。Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the collection of the control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the property to display or hide each column. 集合中的資料行的順序會決定資料行中所顯示的順序控制項。The order of the columns in the collection determines the order that the columns are displayed in the control. 下表列出不同的資料行類別衍生自類別。The following table lists the different column classes that derive from the class. |資料行類別Column Class|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||資料行繫結至資料來源中的欄位。A column that is bound to a field in a data source. 它會在欄位中的每個項目顯示為文字時。It displays each item in the field as text. 這是預設資料行類型，如控制項。This is the default column type for the control.| ||顯示資料行中的每個項目的命令按鈕資料行。A column that displays a command button for each item in the column. 這可讓您建立的自訂按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除按鈕資料行。This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as Add or Remove buttons.| ||資料行，其中包含編輯每個項目的資料行中的命令。A column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| ||此資料行顯示為超連結的資料行中每個項目。A column that displays each item in the column as a hyperlink. 資料行的內容可以繫結至資料來源中的欄位或靜態文字。The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source, or to static text.| ||根據指定的範本資料行中顯示每個項目資料行。A column that displays each item in the column according to a specified template. 這可讓您控制資料行，例如若要顯示的影像內容。This allows you to control the content of the column, for example to display images.| > [!NOTE] > 類別是列出的資料行類別的基底類別。The class is the base class for the column classes listed. 它不會直接在集合。It is not used directly in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以動態方式加入的資料行的集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to dynamically add a column to the control. 請注意，的屬性控制項是的執行個體類別。Note that the property of the control is an instance of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/CS/datagridctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/VB/datagridctorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加入-衍生資料行物件的結尾集合。Use this method to add a -derived column object to the end of a collection. 控制項不會儲存的內容及其檢視狀態中的集合。The control does not store the contents of its collection in the view state. 若要新增或移除資料行，以動態方式，必須以程式設計方式新增或移除資料行每次重新整理頁面時。To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed. 提供`Page_Init`函式，加入或移除資料行之前控制項可以重新載入其狀態，並重建本身。Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the control can reload its state and rebuild itself. 否則，所做的變更集合不會反映在控制項顯示時。Otherwise, the changes to the collection are not reflected in the control when it is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以以程式設計方式將資料行加入或移除資料行從的集合控制項，它是您更輕鬆地以靜態方式列出的資料行，然後使用來顯示或隱藏每個資料行的屬性。Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the collection of the control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the property to display or hide each column. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以動態方式加入的資料行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to dynamically add a column to the control. 請注意，的屬性控制項是的執行個體類別。Note that the property of the control is an instance of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/CS/datagridctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/VB/datagridctorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立介面，可以取得每個項目中透過輕鬆地反覆集合。Use this method to create a interface that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the collection. 使用屬性取得目前的項目指向集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法，以移至下一步 的項目集合中。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法，將列舉程式移至初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 建立之後，就必須呼叫方法物件，或使用之後方法，將列舉程式移至集合中第一個項目。The method must be called after creating a object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 項目，否則為表示屬性未定義。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法用來建立介面，但若要顯示的內容來逐一查看集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a interface that can be iterated though to display the contents of the collection. span.span: The index of the -derived column in the to remove.

summary.span: 從 集合中指定的索引處，移除 衍生資料行物件。

span.span: Removes a -derived column object from the collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除-衍生資料行物件，從集合指定索引處。Use this method to remove a -derived column object from a collection at the specified index. 控制項不會儲存的內容及其檢視狀態中的集合。The control does not store the contents of its collection in the view state. 若要新增或移除資料行，以動態方式，必須以程式設計方式新增或移除資料行每次重新整理頁面時。To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed. 提供`Page_Init`函式，加入或移除資料行之前控制項可以重新載入其狀態，並重建本身。Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the control can reload its state and rebuild itself. 否則，所做的變更集合不會反映在控制項顯示時。Otherwise, the changes to the collection are not reflected in the control when it is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以以程式設計方式將資料行加入或移除資料行從的集合控制項，它是您更輕鬆地以靜態方式列出的資料行，然後使用來顯示或隱藏每個資料行的屬性。Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the collection of the control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the property to display or hide each column. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來移除資料行從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove a column from the collection. 請注意，的屬性控制項是集合。Note that the property of the control is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
